summary: This document is an overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank addressed to Scio Verum Corporation, detailing an overdraft situation on their account as of June 11, 2018. It outlines the account's balance, fees incurred, and provides instructions for avoiding further overdraft fees.

persons.name: Cesar Taveras
persons.context: Cesar Taveras is mentioned as the relationship manager for Scio Verum Corporation's account at Fifth Third Bank.

persons.name: Brian Moore
persons.context: Brian Moore is identified as the Senior Vice President at Fifth Third Bank, who signed the overdraft notice.

events.title: Account Overdraft
events.description: Scio Verum Corporation's account was overdrawn by $52.03 on June 11, 2018, leading to overdraft fees.

keyFacts: Scio Verum Corporation's account was overdrawn by $52.03 on June 11, 2018.
An overdraft fee of $37.00 was assessed on the account.
The account had a beginning balance of $5.97 and total withdrawals of $558.00.
To avoid additional fees, a deposit must be made by June 18, 2018.
The document is signed by Brian Moore, Senior Vice President at Fifth Third Bank.
